channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What on earth is going on with the American consumer?
item.description: U.S. workers are not sure whether to buy that new car — or brace for a recession.

item.title: ‘I’m afraid to ask her’: My stepmother won’t show me my father’s will. What now?
item.description: “She treats my sibling and me as virtual strangers.”

item.title: ‘He failed in his fiduciary duty’: My brother liquidated our mother’s 401(k) for her nursing home. He claimed the rest.
item.description: “My brother, the executor of her will, coerced her during her illness to give him power of attorney.”

item.title: Here’s why Goldman still sees 10% upside to the S&P 500, even with bond yields rising
item.description: Goldman Sachs took a look at rising bond yields and concluded that they’re still not a threat to the S&P 500 this year.

item.title: This market pro says the Fed is going to cut interest rates this year, but ‘they don’t know it yet.’ Is he right?
item.description: Federated Hermes’s Steve Chiavarone crystalized the market’s view of where the Federal Reserve is heading on interest rates in one sentence.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts prefer these dividend stocks for consistent returns
item.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service discusses three dividend-paying stocks, including Home Depot and Diamondback Energy, highlighted by Wall Street's to...

item.title: Apple's China rival Xiaomi still has major upside, analysts say, even after record earnings
item.description: Xiaomi reported record net profit for a second-straight quarter, bolstering several analysts' conviction on the Hong Kong-listed stock.

item.title: These stocks could benefit if interest rates break out higher
item.description: The benchmark 10-year Treasury yield is trading at around 4.5%, up from about 4.0% in early April.

item.title: Analysts stay upbeat on Costco after solid quarter, but say it's richly valued
item.description: Shares have climbed more than 14% so far in 2025 compared with a small decline for the S&P 500.

item.title: Lyft is starting to make some right moves with urging from activist Engine Capital. What's next
item.description: Ken Squire breaks down the Engine position in Lyft.
